_header: Saint Luke us says whoso will hear
_description: Gospel for the Fourteenth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint luke vs sais who so will hereIn oure godspell on þis manere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat we be worthi forto winVntill his blis þat neuer sal blin
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dum iret ihesus crist in ierusalem.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica xiiii estatis Secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 117va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.102-105.
